attributes.action: New homes in Holcroft, Cross Houses
attributes.additional_details:
14/02406/OUT  |  Outline application for residential development to include means of access  |  Land South Of Holcroft Way Cross Houses Shrewsbury Shropshire
OBJECT
NOT SUSTAINABLE:
No schools, recreational facilities, public transport, infrastructure improvements, surface run-off and draining improvements.
Not affordable housing for needs.
More homes with no thought.
Yet another build on GREEN BELT, soon we will have URBAL SPRAWL
